about_the_game:
Welcome to Enigmatic Worlds!
A retro-styled FPS game that is a love letter to obscure 90s FPS games, amiga games, as well as many old Game Maker FPS games that led to discovering classic FPS games and the GZDoom engine in the first place!

Explore many strange and abstract worlds, populated by equally unusual but hostile beings. Not simple enemies either, each enemy type possesses many unique traits, abilities, and behaviors.

You got some handy weaponry at your disposal though! Every one will remain useful and powerful from beginning to end!

Collect objectives to beat each level, while being on the lookout for many secrets within, and avoiding the tricks and traps you encounter.
detailed_description:
Welcome to Enigmatic Worlds!
A retro-styled FPS game that is a love letter to obscure 90s FPS games, amiga games, as well as many old Game Maker FPS games that led to discovering classic FPS games and the GZDoom engine in the first place!

Explore many strange and abstract worlds, populated by equally unusual but hostile beings. Not simple enemies either, each enemy type possesses many unique traits, abilities, and behaviors.

You got some handy weaponry at your disposal though! Every one will remain useful and powerful from beginning to end!

Collect objectives to beat each level, while being on the lookout for many secrets within, and avoiding the tricks and traps you encounter.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:

short_description: Explore strange and abstract worlds filled with equally unusual but deadly beings of many types. Enigmatic Worlds is an FPS inspired by obscure retro-styled FPS games and Amiga games.
